title: Idealist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose to idealize the Mafia the following night during the day (2 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the following night, the Mafia will be informed that the Idealist will create an ideal vision for them tonight.
- When you create an ideal vision for the Mafia, all members of the Mafia will be able to choose a role in the GIM thread to appear as. This will cause any and all investigative abilities to perceive the Mafia members as the role that they chose.
- If an idealized Mafia member dies on the night they were idealized, or if they are lynched the day after, they will appear to be the role they were idealized as in the graveyard.
- If a Mafia member does not choose a role to idealize, they will be perceived as a random role based on their subalignment (Mafia Support/Espionage = random Town Support role, Mafia Deception = random Town Investigative role, Mafia Head/Killing = random Town Killing role, any other Mafia alignment = random Town role). They will be notified what role they were idealized as.
